issue.title: Missing ios_base qualification on members of a dependent class

discussion.p: 27.5.2.4.2, p4, and 27.8.1.6, p2, 27.8.1.7, p3, 27.8.1.9, p2, 27.8.1.10, p3 refer to in and/or out w/o ios_base:: qualification. That's incorrect since the names are members of a dependent base class (14.6.2 [temp.dep]) and thus not visible.

resolution.p: Qualify the names with the name of the class of which they are members, i.e., ios_base.
